mapper.select: select * from board order by board_idx desc
mapper.insert: insert into board (board_idx, member_idx, member_name, board_map, map_dot, board_title, board_content, board_imgStr) values ((select nvl(max(board_idx), 90000) + 1 from board), #{member_idx}, #{member_name}, #{board_map}, #{map_dot}, #{board_title}, #{board_content}, #{board_imgStr})
